summary:
After returning from a long trek abroad, an ambitious brewer seeks a recipe from Skyrim\'s distant past.

The Dead Bee Scrolls quest line begins at the Wandering Bee Meadery, newly added just across the bridge from Dragon Bridge. It takes the player through a new dungeon complex filled with enemies, traps, and new treasures.
descriptionHtml:
After returning from a long trek abroad, an ambitious brewer seeks a recipe from Skyrim\'s distant past.

The Dead Bee Scrolls quest line begins at the Wandering Bee Meadery, newly added just across the bridge from Dragon Bridge. It takes the player through a new dungeon complex filled with enemies, traps, and new treasures.

Update 1.4: Fixed quest pointer and added in a few things.

If anyone finds any bugs that my testers and I missed, please feel free to comment, or send me a message.

If you enjoy my mod, please rate it. More dungeon and quest mods are to come!


[youtube]arjcXS9sJV0[/youtube]

Thank you Player Two, also known on the Nexus as manualdegauss, for making this great trailer!

And a special thanks to Hellcat5, for helping me with some details(I love details) and for his vast assistance to the modding community in general. Any modders out there, check out his tutorials, which are linked from CreationKit.com
author: Jim Lawrence
